itunes:title: Crackseed (with John and Rebecca Lin)
title: Crackseed (with John and Rebecca Lin)
description:
Siblings John and Rebecca Lin of Lin's Hawaiian Snacks talk li hing mui, or crackseed, and share what it's like to take the reins of the family business.
